DOC.brief_summary: The chance achieve pregnancy retrieve > 15 oocyte good , probably bad effect endometrium ( uterine inner lining ) . Therefore , case investigator prefer freeze embryo , transfer thaw cycle . With introduction oocyte vitrification ( fast cooling ) technology , new option emerge : freeze un-fertilized egg , fertilize use later thaw cycle . The purpose study compare outcome two approach .
DOC.brief_title: IVF Hyper-responders : Oocyte Vitrification Compared With Embryo Freezing
DOC.criteria: IVF patient ovulation trigger Decapeptyl 0.2 mg ovarian hyperresponse : E2 trigger day .12,000 pmol/l and/or > 15 oocyte . Normal uterus < 20 % fertilization rate
